data.message: your banning policy is wrong now days after the quick spreading of adding friends requests games pages in which you can add people who likes or comment on a photo you share or a comment you write and you dont need to know these people in real life, and you may receive tens of adding requests and also you send tens of friend requests and in case you are not answered or added you are banned, it is game after all and who participate in it knows that he will receive those requests and he should be free to accept or deny any one so there is no need for banding, So in case you did not pay attention to this issue it is possible that people will leave facebook and look for alternative without banning policy you have.
